title: Memories of Summer, part two
content:
To finish off Summer me and Spouse went for a long weekend to Rome. There’s a lot of type there, and here’s some samples:

Trajan, of course (under scaffolding)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Trajan_4482.jpg)

From the historical center

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Sena_3484.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/GATVM_6525.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/MVLTVS_5958.jpg)

And some more modern ones

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cinema_moderno_3528.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Rione_Angelo_5933.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/traffic_3935.jpg)

An one without type, the compulsory cat photo (like all the postcards)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133007im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cat_4962.jpg)
author: mili
